Product Warnings & Disclaimers Terms & Conditions

Product Warnings & Disclaimers ("the App”) provides customizable warning messages ("the Service") to merchants who use Shopify to power their stores. This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you install or use the App in connection with your Shopify-supported store.


Personal Information We Collect

When you install the App, to ensure Service delivery we are automatically able to access certain types of information about your shop from your Shopify account:

  • Read Store Info: We utilize the store's domain to determine which store is currently using the app. We keep merchant's information, email address in order to contact the merchant for any inquiries or problems.
  • Read and Write Store Products: In order to display the products in the app, we use the permission to read products. 
  • Read and Write Script Tags: After the installation of the App, a few code snippets will be included to the store in order for the App to function.

How Do We Use Your Personal Information?

We use the personal information we collect from you in order to provide the Service and to operate the App and communicate with you. Additionally, provide you with information related to our products or services.


Sharing Your Personal Information

Your personal information that is collected by the App is not shared.


Your Right

If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below. Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above. Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.


Data Retention

When you installed the app, we will maintain your store's information (store domain and email) for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.


Changes

We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.


Contact Us

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at appblox.net@gmail.com

Ideal Shopify apps that enchance your customer's shopping experience
